name: Zeluke A New Note
description:
This game was made for the Secret Santa Game Jam.

I had big goals for this game but unfortunately ran out of time. 

To play this game you can use the mouse to look around.

WSAD or Arrows to walk.

The only thing you can do as of now is collect the 100 Ruby's.

For the best experience, you should download and play the PC version.

Game Made By: Cracked Dome

Music by: https://ariyassa.itch.io/
